name: One Night in Romania
description:
Can you last 1 night in Romania?

You run out of fuel on a road near Craiova and decide to go to the nearest house and ask for some fuel.

The man living there tells you to take care of his house while he goes to the city to bring you fuel. What could possibly happen in 6 hours?

Gameplay

You have to stay alive until 6 am, not that there's someone trying to kill you or anything.
Keep adding wood to the fire in the living room and close your room's door if necessary. Check the cameras before leaving your room so you won't bump into anything or anyone on your way.

Credits

This is a fan game of the Five Nights at Freddy's series by Scott Cawthon
Thanks to all my friends who helped me test the game
Special thanks to Black Biosis for voicing the man on  the phone

Sounds used:

"Ambience, Creepy Wind, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Something Evil Approaches, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Piano, String Glissando, Low, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

"Ambience, Night Wildlife, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org|

Door, Church, Close, E.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

And many more sounds from Freesounds.org

This is the first time I made a game like this so I hope you enjoy it!
